lyrics_abstract:

Where would I be
Without you baby
So if you need me

Because I love ya- yeah
And don't you forget it
Whenever you need me
If you want me to put it on you, come on
Oh, oh, oh
(Uh, uh uh)
darling where would I be?
(Yeah, yeah Vita Ja Rule uh uh uh)
Whoa, whoa, oh
(Where would I be without you)
Baby, without you

[Ja Rule](Lil' Mo)
Where would I be without my baby (baby)
The thought alone might break me (ooh)
And I don't wanna go crazy
Cuz every thug needs a lady
(Yeah, yeah)

Girl it feel like you and I bee[...]
